Package ca.corefacility.gview.managers

Provides for dynamic handling of different items on the map.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DisplayManager  
FeaturesManager Handles layout/building up of features within the slots.
LayoutManager Handles anything relating to layout (mainly the Backbone/SlotPath objects).
LegendManager  
PlotsManager  
ResolutionManager Handles the calculation of when to switch resolutions based upon the current scale.
SectionID  
SectionManager Divide map up into sections, and manage/display each section individually.
StyleEventManager Used to manage any style events, and handle swapping of style objects.
ZoomEventDistributor This class receives zoom events from the backbone, determines if they would result in a context switch or not and distributes the appropriate events to any listeners.
 

Enum Summary
ResolutionManager.Direction  
 

Package ca.corefacility.gview.managers Description

Provides for dynamic handling of different items on the map. Each manager is responsible for a specific set of items. DisplayManager is the main manager for everything to be displayed.
